name: Bejailed
description:
Placed 222/1365 of competition entries to Ludum Dare 31! The theme was "Entire Game on One Screen". It's a top-down shooter/dungeon crawly/match-3 hybrid!

W,A,S,D to move

Left Mouse to fire gun

Right Mouse to use freezing gun

Stay in the yellow diamonds to activate a room

Three adjacent activated rooms clear giving a bonus depending on the last room cleared

Clear three matching rooms for a bonus

New rooms spawn and old rooms move down to fill cleared space

Clear three purple rooms in one go to escape

Don't die!

Good Luck

(It's probably really buggy, if you getting something game-breaking just restart!)
